comments_key2: We can write comments in any program . When we run the program these comments do not get executed.
comments_key3: Comments are written for our understanding, and for the people who are working on that code with us or people with whom we will work later etc. For the understanding of all these people, comments are used.
comments_key4: What does your program do, is very important to write in comments in a given technical language?
comments_key5:
Many times we have seen that the students who don't write comments properly during interviews, they get a very negative feedback in interviews.
If you make this as a habit then your own understanding will improve and in future you will not face any problem.
